feature1.explanation: Both texts use similar punctuation styles including commas, periods, and hyphens.

feature2.explanation: Lexical and grammatical features show some differences in word choices and sentence structure between the two texts.

feature3.explanation: Sentence structure and quantitative features differ significantly in complexity, length, and coherence.

feature4.explanation: Text and discourse features also show notable differences in narrative style and tone.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text.

overall.explanation: Overall, considering the differences in lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, and text discourse features, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is moderate.
